description.value: When you take the Attack|XPHB action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d6 Acid damage.

_srdData.name: Acid
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself.
